text:
[Verse]
Woke up felt the morning heat
Concrete jungle busy streets
Everyone lost in the beat
Heartbeat syncs with every step

[Verse 2]
Neon signs and flashing lights
Footsteps echo in the night
Lost but feeling so alive
Under skies that never die

[Chorus]
City lights city dreams
Underneath the endless beams
Can you feel the urban breeze
Dancing under city trees

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers touch the stars
Wonder who we really are
Lonely hearts and beat up cars
In the city we go far

[Chorus]
City lights city dreams
Underneath the endless beams
Can you feel the urban breeze
Dancing under city trees

[Bridge]
Every turn a mystery
Lost and found in history
In the noise we find our way
City whispers what to say
title: Lost In The City Lights
